name: PREALPHA: Time Stop Game Concept
description:
A game by Noah Caccamo, Sabrina Leung and Lingsi Zhu

CONTROLS

Exit Game: Alt + F4 or other force close commands

NOTE GAME DOES NOT NATIVELY CLOSE

A + D: Move left and right

Space: Jump

E: Interact/advance text

S: Fall through platforms

J: Attack - after getting spear

Shift: Dash

ALSO PLS DONT JUMP OFF THE WORLD

When you get to the far right of the village you can yeet off the edge. There's nothing down there. I promise you that.

oh and the mountain. theres literally nothing to gain from climbing the wall on the left. just dont its unfinished haha
